00034 using namespace std;
00035 using namespace affx;
00036 
00037 void File5_Sqlite::makeCreateStatement(File5_Tsv *tsv, const string &primaryColumn,
00038                                        const string &tableName, const string &numeric,
00039                                        string &createSql) {
00040   createSql = "create table " + tableName + " ( ";
00041   int colCount = tsv->getColumnCount(0);
00042   for ( int i = 0; i < colCount; i++) {
00043     string name;
00044     tsv->getColumnName(0,i,&name);
00045     bool isPrimaryKey = (name == primaryColumn);
00046     affx::File5_TsvColumn* column = tsv->getColumnPtr(0,i);
00047     File5_dtype_t type = column->file5_dtype();
00048     createSql += " '" + name + "' ";
00049     if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_STRING) {
00050       int stringSize = column->getOptStringSize();
00051       createSql += " varchar(" + ToStr(stringSize) + ") ";
00052     }
00053     else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR) {
00054       createSql += " int(1) ";
00055     }
00056     else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT) {
00057       createSql += " int(2) ";
00058     }
00059     else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_INT) {
00060       createSql += " int ";
00061     }
00062     else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT) {
00063       createSql += numeric;
00064     }
00065     else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE) {
00066       createSql += numeric;
00067     }
00068     else {
00069       Err::errAbort("Don't recognize type: " + ToStr(type));
00070     }
00071 
00072     if (isPrimaryKey) {
00073       createSql += " primary key ";
00074     }
00075     if ((i + 1) != colCount)
00076       createSql += ", ";
00077   }
00078   createSql += ");";
00079 }
00080 
00081 void File5_Sqlite::copySchema(sqlite3 *db, File5_Tsv *tsv, File5_Sqlite_Config &config) {
00082   string createSql;
00083   makeCreateStatement(tsv, config.primaryColumn, config.tableName, config.numeric, createSql);
00084   Verbose::out(2, "Creating table: " + config.tableName + " from file: " + tsv->m_name);
00085   execute(db, createSql);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void File5_Sqlite::execute(sqlite3 *db, const string &sql) {
00089   
00090   sqlite3_stmt *stmt = NULL;  
00091   int status = 0;
00092     if ((status = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql.c_str(), sql.size(), &stmt, NULL)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00093       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " preparing statement: " + sql);
00094     }
00095     
00096     if ((status = sqlite3_step(stmt)) != SQLITE_DONE) {
00097       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " executing statement: " + sql);
00098     }
00099     
00100     if ((status = sqlite3_finalize(stmt)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00101       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " finalizing statement: " + sql);
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void File5_Sqlite::copyData(sqlite3 *db, File5_Tsv *tsv, File5_Sqlite_Config &config) {
00106 
00107   string tableName = config.tableName;
00108   int colCount = tsv->getColumnCount(0);
00109   string insert;
00110   int count = 0;
00111   int interval = 0;
00112   int lineCount = tsv->getLineCount();
00113   interval = lineCount / 20;
00114   int dotMod = max(int(lineCount/20),1);
00115   Verbose::progressBegin(2, "Inserting " + ToStr(lineCount) + " rows", 20, dotMod, lineCount);
00116   execute(db, "begin transaction;");
00117   while(tsv->nextLevel(0) == FILE5_OK) {
00118     count++;
00119     Verbose::progressStep(2);
00120     string insert = "insert into " + tableName + " values ( ";
00121     for(int i = 0; i < colCount; i++) { 
00122       affx::File5_TsvColumn* column = tsv->getColumnPtr(0,i);
00123       File5_dtype_t type = column->file5_dtype();
00124       if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_STRING) {
00125         string s;
00126         tsv->get(0, i, &s);
00127         insert += " '" + s + "' ";
00128       }
00129       else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR) {
00130         char c;
00131         tsv->get(0, i, &c);
00132         insert += ToStr((int)c);
00133       }
00134       else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT) {
00135         Err::errAbort("No File5_Tsv::get() for shorts.");
00136       }
00137       else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_INT) {
00138         int integer;
00139         tsv->get(0, i, &integer);
00140         insert += ToStr(integer);
00141       }
00142       else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT) {
00143         float f;
00144         tsv->get(0, i, &f);
00145         insert += ToStr(f);
00146       }
00147       else if (type == FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE) {
00148         double d;
00149         tsv->get(0, i, &d);
00150         insert += ToStr(d);
00151       }
00152       else {
00153         Err::errAbort("Don't recognize type: " + ToStr(type));
00154       }
00155       if ((i + 1) != colCount)
00156         insert += ", ";
00157     }
00158     insert += ");";
00159     execute(db, insert);
00160   }
00161   
00162   execute(db, "commit;");
00163   Verbose::progressEnd(2, "Done.");
00164 }
